mapinfo.detailsText: Big Continent: a giant sized random continent
mapinfo.loadDetailsText: Big Continent is a much-larger-than-normal map with random terrain patterns and matching resources and tribes. Each map has randomly several Native villages of 1 or 2 types, randomly several variations on trade routes and endless random variety of terrain features such as lakes or ponds, cliffs or canyons. The increased size and rich fishing allows new strategies.
